name: Allantoin
description: Allantoin is a naturally ocurring nitrogenous compound used as a skin conditioning agent.

name: Azelaic Acid
description: Azelaic Acid is a dicarboxylic acid.

name: Caffeine
description: Caffeine is a heterocyclic organic compound.

name: Cetearyl Alcohol
description: Cetearyl Alcohol is a mixture of cetyl and stearyl alcohols that can come from vegetable or synthetic sources.

name: Dimethicone
description: Dimethicone (also called polymethylsiloxane) is a silicon-based polymer used as a lubricant and conditioning agent.

name: Hyaluronic Acid
description: Hyaluronic Acid is a natural polysaccharide found in connective tissues such as cartilage.

name: Stearic Acid
description: Stearic acid is a naturally occurring fatty acid. It is listed in the PETA's Caring Consumer guide as a substance of animal origin, since stearic acid is primarily derived from rendered fat of farm and domestic animals.

name: Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Extract
description: Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Extract is a hydrolysate of Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract (q.v.)derived by acid, enzyme or other method of hydrolysis.

name: Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Extract
description: Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Extract is a hydrolysate of Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract (q.v.)derived by acid, enzyme or other method of hydrolysis.

name: Triethanolamine
description: Triethanolamine is a strongly alkaline substance used as surfactant and pH adjusting chemical.

name: Pueraria Thunbergiana Root Extract
description: Pueraria Thunbergiana Root Extract is an extract of the roots of Pueraria thunbergiana.
